name: Flutterly
description:
How to play

Note the butterfly icons in the top left. Dig through the butterflies onscreen to select and drop the same butterfly onto its icon. Score big for clearing all icons.

Each butterfly is uniquely generated.

   

OpenJam2020 competition entry.

Repository at: https://github.com/abrightmoore/butterflies

Open source tools used

  • PyGame - for display and UI. See https://www.pygame.org/
  • GIMP - for pixel art. See https://www.gimp.org/
  • Notepad++ - for debugging and logging
  • Audacity - for audio processing
